name: Francia
title: Exceptional
review: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Hannah's Guesthouse. The hosts were pleasant and accommodating. They went above and beyond to make my stay comfortable.

name: Martin
title: Very Good
review: Rhona was extremely curtious and friendly.

name: Laurie
title: Excellent value for money in immaculate room
review: Amazing value for money. Room was spacious and immaculate and very tastefully decorated with huge comfy bed. Host was very friendly and quick easy check in/check out. Doubt youâ€™d find a nicer room for the price. Was handy having a fridge and microwave as well as a nice seating area and the local information in the room was useful too.

name: Rhoda
title: Exceptional Guesthouse
review: The warm welcome and the homely atmosphere was very much appreciated. This is truly a very well thought out guesthouse and very well run. I loved the breakfast area and the well cooked and presented breakfast. Rhona and Joe are very kind and thoughtful people. It was a pleasure to meet you and keep up the great work you do. Big huge thanks ðŸ˜Š xx

name: Lucia
title: Exceptional
review: Had a wonderful stay at the guesthouse. The rooms are beautifully decorated and clean. Rhona and Joe were most accommodating and breakfast was great! Definitely recommend staying here!
